Question: Asiabots Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Asiabots Limited

Product Highlight: Digital Human A.I. Ambassador

- Enterprise-grade AI Automation Products
- Integration with current system
- Reliable after sales support
- Cloud-based AI call bot for customer inquiries
- Conversational A.I. self-service kiosk
- Digital Human A.I. Ambassador with generative A.I. technology
- Omni-channel AI customer service
- Use cases in financial enterprise, government agencies, and healthcare
- Relentless pursuit of technological innovation in conversational AI technology
- Locations: Hong Kong, Taiwan, Macau, Canada
